original_title: Raising the Bar 1: Hollywood Cock Tales
overview: Are you ready to start raising the bar? When a group of hot oversexed friends decide who can outdo each other in the fucking department, the bar gets raised to orgasmic proportions. As they capture their darkest and dirtiest sex-capades on amateur cams to present to each other, a carnal game is created that separates the boys from the men... and may even separate the friends from each other.
title: Raising the Bar 1: Hollywood Cock Tales
